casebody.data:
No. D-2519. In the Matter of Discipline of Paul Mpande Ngobeni. 562 U.S. 811, 131 S. Ct. 401,

178 L. Ed. 2d 266,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7634. October 4, 2010.

Paul Mpande Ngobeni, of Putnam, Connecticut, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
